title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it no longer takes focus. If I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I click on the first Combo labeled 'Host:', the focus caret should be within the 'Host:' Combo.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the 'Host:' Combo at the top of the interface.
3. Click on the 'Host:' Combo. The expected behavior is that it should take focus, but it doesn't.
